China:
Su completed a clock tower in Kaifeng.
The Dongpo Academy was established on Hainan.
Spain:
Sancho Ramírez died during a siege of Huesca.  He was succeeded as king of Aragon and Navarre by his eldest son Peter I of Aragon and Pamplona.
El Cid reconquered Valencia, Spain for Castile.
Alfonso the Brave lost Lisbon, Sintra and Santarém, Portugal to Almoravid conquests.
